channel.title: When I Edit .cfg Files... And compile and run... everything stays the same!
channel.description:
Okay... heres what I do: 1.) I Open a Notepad 2.) I click 'File' in the notepad 3.) I go to my Source Files 4.) I open up a .cfg file in the Notepad 5.) I edit and save it 6.) I Compile the Server 7.) I run the server
IS there something wrong there? Like how I'm opening the .cfg files?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 12:56:57 PM[/size][hr]HELP PWWEEEZ

Okay… heres what I do:
1.) I Open a Notepad
2.) I click ‘File’ in the notepad
3.) I go to my Source Files
4.) I open up a .cfg file in the Notepad
5.) I edit and save it
6.) I Compile the Server
7.) I run the server
